### API

<div class="card">

Data 属性说明

| 属性 | 说明 | 类型 | 可选值 | 默认值 |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| cancelBubble | 是否允许事件冒泡 | `Boolean` | `true`/`false` | `true` |
| hairline | 是否显示细边框 | `Boolean` | `true`/`false` | `true` |
| size | 图片宽高比 | `String` | `'1:1'`/`'2:3'`/`'3:1'`/`'3:2'`/`'3:4'`/<br>`'4:3'`/`'5:2'`/`'16:9'`/`'21:4'`/`'full'` | `1:1` |
| url | 图片地址 | `String` | - | `''` |

</div>
